flavorText: Come and rest here, beyond the constraints of space and time.

foreignData.flavorText: Komm her und ruhe dich aus — jenseits der Beschränkungen von Raum und Zeit.
foreignData.name: Heiligtum der Ewigkeit
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{2}, {T}: Bringe einen Kommandeur deiner Wahl, den du besitzt, aus dem Spiel auf deine Hand zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Ven y descansa en este lugar, al margen de las restricciones del espacio y el tiempo.
foreignData.name: Santuario de la eternidad
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{2}, {T}: Regresa del campo de batalla a tu mano al comandante objetivo del cual eres propietario. Activa esta habilidad solo durante tu turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Venez vous reposer ici, par-delà les contraintes de l'espace et du temps.
foreignData.name: Sanctuaire de l'éternité
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{2}, {T} : Renvoyez le commandant ciblé que vous possédez depuis le champ de bataille dans votre main. N'activez cette capacité que pendant votre tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Venite a riposare qui, oltre i vincoli dello spazio e del tempo.
foreignData.name: Santuario dell'Eternità
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{2}, {T}: Riprendi in mano un comandante bersaglio che possiedi dal campo di battaglia. Attiva questa abilità solo durante il tuo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: こちらへ来て休みなさい、空間と時間の制約を超えて。
foreignData.name: 永遠の聖域
foreignData.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{2}, {T}：戦場からあなたがオーナーである統率者１体を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。この能力は、あなたのターンの間にのみ起動できる。

foreignData.flavorText: Venha e descanse aqui, além das limitações do espaço e do tempo.
foreignData.name: Santuário da Eternidade
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{2}, {T}: Devolva o comandante alvo que seja seu do campo de batalha para sua mão. Ative esta habilidade apenas durante o seu turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Приходи, отдохни здесь, сбросив ограничения пространства и времени.
foreignData.name: Святилище Вечности
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{2}, {T}: верните целевого принадлежащего вам командира с поля битвы в вашу руку. Активируйте эту способность только во время вашего хода.

name: Sanctum of Eternity
originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Return target commander you own from the battlefield to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn.

rulings.text: The “commander tax” increases based on how many times a commander was cast from the command zone. Casting a commander from your hand doesn’t require that additional cost, and it doesn’t increase what the cost will be the next time you cast that commander from the command zone.
If your commander isn’t on the battlefield (or if you’re not playing the Commander variant), Sanctum of Eternity’s second ability does nothing.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Return target commander you own from the battlefield to your hand. Activate only during your turn.
